pyzui.statictileprovider module¶

Class for loading tiles from the local tilestore.

class pyzui.statictileprovider.StaticTileProvider(tilecache)[source]¶

Bases: TileProvider

StaticTileProvider objects are used for loading tiles from the disk-cache into a TileCache.

Constructor: StaticTileProvider(TileCache)

Create a new TileProvider for loading tiles into the given tilecache.

_load(tile_id)[source]¶

Load the requested tile, and return it as an Image object.

Returns None if the tile does not exist.

_load(tuple<string,int,int,int>) -> Image or None
